name: Network Infrastructure Sprites
description: Comprehensive sprite library for network topology, infrastructure, security, and cloud components

infrastructure.name: Network Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Core networking hardware and infrastructure components

router.name: Network Router
router.description: Enterprise router with multiple ports and routing indicators
router.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="120" height="60" rx="6" fill="#1f2937" stroke="#374151" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="8" y="8" width="104" height="44" rx="4" fill="#4b5563"/><rect x="15" y="15" width="90" height="30" rx="2" fill="#6b7280"/><circle cx="25" cy="30" r="4" fill="#10b981"/><circle cx="40" cy="30" r="4" fill="#10b981"/><circle cx="55" cy="30" r="4" fill="#f59e0b"/><circle cx="70" cy="30" r="4" fill="#10b981"/><circle cx="85" cy="30" r="4" fill="#10b981"/><circle cx="95" cy="30" r="4" fill="#ef4444"/><rect x="20" y="50" width="8" height="6" rx="1" fill="#374151"/><rect x="35" y="50" width="8" height="6" rx="1" fill="#374151"/><rect x="50" y="50" width="8" height="6" rx="1" fill="#374151"/><rect x="65" y="50" width="8" height="6" rx="1" fill="#374151"/><rect x="80" y="50" width="8" height="6" rx="1" fill="#374151"/><rect x="95" y="50" width="8" height="6" rx="1" fill="#374151"/><text x="60" y="25" text-anchor="middle" font-size="8" fill="#ffffff" font-weight="bold">ROUTER</text>

switch.name: Network Switch
switch.description: Ethernet switch with multiple ports and link indicators
switch.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="100" height="50" rx="4" fill="#065f46" stroke="#047857" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="6" y="6" width="88" height="38" rx="2" fill="#10b981"/><rect x="12" y="12" width="76" height="26" rx="2" fill="#34d399"/><rect x="15" y="42" width="6" height="4" rx="1" fill="#047857"/><rect x="25" y="42" width="6" height="4" rx="1" fill="#047857"/><rect x="35" y="42" width="6" height="4" rx="1" fill="#047857"/><rect x="45" y="42" width="6" height="4" rx="1" fill="#047857"/><rect x="55" y="42" width="6" height="4" rx="1" fill="#047857"/><rect x="65" y="42" width="6" height="4" rx="1" fill="#047857"/><rect x="75" y="42" width="6" height="4" rx="1" fill="#047857"/><circle cx="20" cy="25" r="2" fill="#10b981"/><circle cx="30" cy="25" r="2" fill="#10b981"/><circle cx="40" cy="25" r="2" fill="#f59e0b"/><circle cx="50" cy="25" r="2" fill="#10b981"/><circle cx="60" cy="25" r="2" fill="#10b981"/><circle cx="70" cy="25" r="2" fill="#10b981"/><circle cx="80" cy="25" r="2" fill="#10b981"/><text x="50" y="20" text-anchor="middle" font-size="7" fill="#047857" font-weight="bold">SWITCH</text>

firewall.name: Network Firewall
firewall.description: Security firewall with shield icon and protection indicators
firewall.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="80" height="80" rx="8" fill="#dc2626" stroke="#b91c1c" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="8" y="8" width="64" height="64" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><path d="M40 15 L50 20 L50 35 Q50 45 40 50 Q30 45 30 35 L30 20 Z" fill="#dc2626" stroke="#b91c1c" stroke-width="1"/><path d="M35 30 L38 33 L45 26" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="2" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/><rect x="15" y="60" width="50" height="3" rx="1" fill="#dc2626" opacity="0.6"/><rect x="20" y="66" width="40" height="3" rx="1" fill="#dc2626" opacity="0.4"/><text x="40" y="75" text-anchor="middle" font-size="7" fill="#b91c1c" font-weight="bold">FIREWALL</text>

load-balancer.name: Load Balancer
load-balancer.description: Load balancer with traffic distribution visualization
load-balancer.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="120" height="80" rx="8" fill="#7c3aed" stroke="#6d28d9" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="10" y="10" width="100" height="60" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><circle cx="30" cy="40" r="8" fill="#a78bfa"/><path d="M38 40 L60 25 M38 40 L60 40 M38 40 L60 55" stroke="#7c3aed" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#lbArrow)"/><circle cx="80" cy="25" r="6" fill="#8b5cf6"/><circle cx="80" cy="40" r="6" fill="#8b5cf6"/><circle cx="80" cy="55" r="6" fill="#8b5cf6"/><text x="60" y="70" text-anchor="middle" font-size="8" fill="#6d28d9" font-weight="bold">LOAD BALANCER</text><defs><marker id="lbArrow" markerWidth="8" markerHeight="8" refX="7" refY="3" orient="auto"><polygon points="0 0, 8 3, 0 6" fill="#7c3aed"/></marker></defs>

cloud.name: Cloud Infrastructure
cloud.description: Cloud services, regions, and distributed infrastructure

cloud-region.name: Cloud Region
cloud-region.description: Cloud provider region with availability zones
cloud-region.svg: <ellipse cx="70" cy="40" rx="60" ry="30" fill="#0ea5e9" stroke="#0284c7" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.8"/><ellipse cx="50" cy="30" rx="40" ry="20" fill="#38bdf8" opacity="0.6"/><ellipse cx="90" cy="35" rx="35" ry="18" fill="#7dd3fc" opacity="0.5"/><ellipse cx="70" cy="50" rx="45" ry="15" fill="#bae6fd" opacity="0.4"/><circle cx="45" cy="25" r="3" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.8"/><circle cx="65" cy="20" r="2" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.6"/><circle cx="85" cy="25" r="2.5" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.7"/><circle cx="95" cy="30" r="2" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.5"/><circle cx="55" cy="45" r="2" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.6"/><circle cx="80" cy="50" r="2.5" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.7"/><text x="70" y="65" text-anchor="middle" font-size="9" fill="#0284c7" font-weight="bold">REGION</text>

availability-zone.name: Availability Zone
availability-zone.description: Cloud availability zone with redundancy indicators
availability-zone.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="100" height="80" rx="8" fill="#1e40af" stroke="#1d4ed8" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/><rect x="10" y="10" width="80" height="60" rx="4" fill="#3b82f6" opacity="0.2"/><rect x="20" y="20" width="25" height="20" rx="2" fill="#60a5fa"/><rect x="55" y="20" width="25" height="20" rx="2" fill="#60a5fa"/><rect x="20" y="50" width="25" height="20" rx="2" fill="#60a5fa"/><rect x="55" y="50" width="25" height="20" rx="2" fill="#60a5fa"/><text x="50" y="15" text-anchor="middle" font-size="8" fill="#1d4ed8" font-weight="bold">AZ-1</text><text x="32" y="32" text-anchor="middle" font-size="6" fill="#ffffff" font-weight="bold">A</text><text x="67" y="32" text-anchor="middle" font-size="6" fill="#ffffff" font-weight="bold">B</text><text x="32" y="62" text-anchor="middle" font-size="6" fill="#ffffff" font-weight="bold">C</text><text x="67" y="62" text-anchor="middle" font-size="6" fill="#ffffff" font-weight="bold">D</text>

security.name: Security Components
security.description: Network security, encryption, and access control components

vpn-gateway.name: VPN Gateway
vpn-gateway.description: VPN gateway with encrypted tunnel visualization
vpn-gateway.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="120" height="70" rx="8" fill="#7c2d12" stroke="#92400e" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="10" y="10" width="100" height="50" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><rect x="20" y="20" width="30" height="30" rx="4" fill="#ea580c"/><rect x="70" y="20" width="30" height="30" rx="4" fill="#ea580c"/><path d="M50 35 L70 35" stroke="#dc2626" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="3,2"/><circle cx="35" cy="35" r="3" fill="#ffffff"/><circle cx="85" cy="35" r="3" fill="#ffffff"/><path d="M30 25 L35 30 L40 25 M75 25 L85 30 L95 25" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/><text x="60" y="65" text-anchor="middle" font-size="8" fill="#92400e" font-weight="bold">VPN</text>

ssl-certificate.name: SSL Certificate
ssl-certificate.description: SSL/TLS certificate with lock and validation indicators
ssl-certificate.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="80" height="100" rx="6" fill="#065f46" stroke="#047857" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="8" y="8" width="64" height="84" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.95"/><rect x="30" y="15" width="20" height="15" rx="2" fill="none" stroke="#047857" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="25" y="25" width="30" height="20" rx="3" fill="#10b981" stroke="#047857" stroke-width="2"/><circle cx="40" cy="35" r="2" fill="#ffffff"/><rect x="15" y="50" width="50" height="3" rx="1" fill="#34d399"/><rect x="15" y="58" width="40" height="3" rx="1" fill="#6ee7b7"/><rect x="15" y="66" width="45" height="3" rx="1" fill="#6ee7b7"/><rect x="15" y="74" width="35" height="3" rx="1" fill="#6ee7b7"/><text x="40" y="88" text-anchor="middle" font-size="8" fill="#047857" font-weight="bold">SSL</text>
